name: Stainless Steel Litter Box | XL Enclosed Cat Litter Boxes with Lid for Big Cats | High Sided, Anti-Urine Leakage | Non-Stick Bottom & Includes Litter Mat & Metal Scoop
short_description: ENCLOSED DESIGN: The cat litter box with top cover is designed to prevent litter scatter and provide a private space for your furry friends. The cat litter box is made of high-quality stainless steel, which is long-lasting, rust-proof, and easy to clean. The sturdy construction ensures that the box can withstand the weight of your cats and provide long-term use.

EXCLUSIVE DESIGN PATENT：The 30° angled litter filter plate in the AIPERRO litter box provides a specific advantage in preventing cats from easily taking litter out of the box. This can be particularly beneficial in keeping the surrounding area clean and reducing the need for constant cleanup.

XL SIZE: The stainless steel cat litter box is extra large, measuring 23 x 15 x 11 inches. It is suitable for cats of all sizes, including large and giant breeds. The high sides prevent litter from spilling out, making it easy to clean and maintain.

ANTI-URINE LEAKAGE: The cat litter box is designed with a leak-proof design, including a sealed bottom and a curved shape. Superior sealing - ensures liquids are contained within the stainless steel cat litter box, keeps your home clean and no odor.

PERFECT COMBINATION: Stainless steel litter box comes with a cat litter mat, which provides a comfortable surface for your cats to step on. It also includes an all-metal litter scoop, making it easy to clean the litter box thoroughly.

Annex 1 (Cat litter mat)：Litter trapping mat with double layer Large holes honeycomb design will work well in trapping locking litter. Detachable design, easy to clean and dry, never say goodbye to odor and litter all over the floor.

Annex 2 (Cat litter scoop) : Stainless steel cat litter scoop (0.4"-0.2"Gaps), fast sifting making it easy to clean the litter box thoroughly, durable and heavy duty. Comes with hooks to place directly on the litter box lid or enclosure.

name: Enclosed Cat Litter Box, Large Litter Box for Big Cats, Covered Kitty Litter Boxes with Lid, Top Entry Cat Box Enclosure with Scoop, Odor Control, Easy to Clean(Coffee)
short_description: Two-Way Entry and Exit Design: This enclosed litter box features a versatile design with two ways to enter and exit. An adjustable clip allows you to set the front door for entry-only, which encourages your cat to leave through the top opening. This one-way system also helps to collect litter. Alternatively, you can let your cats use the door for both entering and exiting to suit their habits

Easy Cleaning and Odor Control: The kitty litter box designed with a pull-out drawer and a 2-in-1 litter scoop, streamlines cleanup. The enclosed design minimizes odor emissions and enhances privacy, making it an ideal solution for odor control and your cat's comfort, also could be a dog proof litter box

Foldable and Portable Design: The foldable design of this covered litter box making installation and disassembly simple. When not in use, it can be folded to save space for easy storage.Its lightweight yet easy to carry structure offers more convenience when you want to travel with your cat, while allowing your cat to have a stress free toilet environment anytime and anywhere

Spacious and Large Litter Box: With ample space inside, this large litter box accommodates most cat breeds, providing room to move, turn, and dig comfortably. The large-capacity, drawer-style bottom litter pan tray reduces the need for frequent litter refills and complete changes, making this standard cat litter box perfect for households with active or multiple kittens

No More Mess Cat Box: This top entry litter box features a perforated lid, as your cat steps out, the gaps in this grate effectively filter litter off their paws. The high wall of this enclosed cat litter box also prevent litter splashing and keeping the surrounding area clean and tidy. Plus, the fully sealed base design minimizes leaks for worry-free use

name: Arm & Hammer Large Sifting Litter Box Scoop Free Cat Litter Tray with Microban, Made in USA
short_description: EASY CLEANING: Simplify your cat care routine with the sifting cat litter box's patented lift-to-sift technology. This provides efficient litter maintenance without scooping.
MAXIMUM ODOR CONTROL: As one of the best litter boxes for indoor cats, its built-in Microban protection inhibits odors from kitty litter.
MADE WITH RECYCLED MATERIALS: This sifting litter box for pine pellets is Made in the USA with recycled materials.
VERSATILE LITTER COMPATIBILITY: Our cat litter tray can utilize pine, crystal, pellets, and clumping cat litter. We suggest using Arm & Hammer SLIDE for optimal results with this cat litterbox.
COMFORTABLE SPACE FOR CATS: By following the guideline of being 1.5 times longer than your cat, and with its large cat litter box design, this product accommodates your feline friend's comfort needs.
product_description: Designed as a large litter box, it features advanced sifting technology that eliminates the need for a litter scoop. Simply lift the sifting box to separate clumps, keeping the cat litter box large and clean. The built-in Microban protection actively inhibits unpleasant odors. This jumbo litter box is made with recycled materials. It highlights Arm & Hammer's dedication to eco-friendly and sustainable pet supplies for cats. It accommodates various types of litter, including pellets for cat litter box, pine, crystal, and clumping varieties, with Arm & Hammer Slide being the preferred choice. Our high sided litter box is particularly suited for large cats, providing spacious comfort. As part of the Arm & Hammer range that includes pet supplies for cats like cat litter mats, cat litter & housebreaking, litter box with lid, cat boxes for indoor cats, kitty litter box, sifting litter boxes and more, this cat litter box offers a comprehensive suite of pet supplies for cats, including solutions for cat litter & housebreaking needs. With its easy clean litter box design, this xl cat litter box provides convenience and hygiene, making it a reliable choice for cat litter boxes for indoor cats. Invest in the Arm & Hammer Large Sifting Litter Box for a hassle-free experience, meeting all your kitty litter box needs.

name: Feandrea Cat Litter Box with Lid, XL Enclosed Litter Box with Slide-Out Tray, Scoop, Brush, Anti-Tracking, for Cats of Different Sizes, Dove Gray and Slat Gray UPPT002B01
short_description: 【EASY SLIDING, EASY CLEANING】Featuring a slide-out tray, this covered cat litter box makes it so easy to scoop or change litter. Plus, a scoop and a brush are included to help scoop the waste and clean the litter on the top or in the corners
【SPACIOUS ROOM INSIDE】The inner size of the large cat litter box is 19.7" x 15.9" x 13.6", offering roomy space for your cats

【REDUCED TRACKING】The grate top catches and returns stray litter to the box as your cat exits, while the raised edges further reduce litter tracking. Enjoy a cleaner home with this enclosed cat litter box!
【NO SIDE LEAKING】Featuring a double-layer construction on the side joints, this litter box prevents litter from leaking onto the floor. A true lifesaver if your cat likes to dig!

【1 DOOR, 3 OPTIONS】Turn the rotating knob to change the door to a one-way entry, one-way exit, or two-way door. Choose one-way for the front door as the entrance and the top as the exit (or vice versa), or two-way for free comings and goings—you decide
【MORE PRIVACY, LESS ODOR】Thanks to the enclosed space, your cat has a private place where they feel safe to answer nature’s call, and you have less unpleasant messes

name: IRIS USA Cat Litter Box, Large Litter Box Enclosure with Front Door Flap and Scoop, Covered Kitty Litter Box with Handle and Buckles for Portability and Privacy, Gray
short_description: ODOR CONTROL: The easy access flap door seals in odors and keeps particles from spilling onto the floor, ensuring they don't infiltrate your home and keeping the area neat and clean.
ENCLOSED PRIVACY: The 9.25"W x 9"H wide door opening allows your cat access while ensuring a private, enclosed space for comfort and security.
PORTABLE CONSTRUCTION: Equipped with a carrying handle and secure buckles for easy transportation while litter box is emptied.
ORGANIZED: The included scoop features a hook, allowing you to hang it on the underside of the hood to store it between cleanings and have it within reach whenever it's needed.
DIMENSIONS: The Litter box measuring 21"L x 18.75"W x 17"H with interior dimensions of 15.25"L x 14"W x 15.5"H provides ample space for small to medium cats.
product_description: No dogs allowed. Give your cat the privacy they need and keep the dog’s nose out of the litter box with the front entry litter box by IRIS USA, Inc. Your cat will love the easy front entry that provides them with room to move around and you'll love how well it prevents messes and odors from spreading. The hood creates an enclosed space that keeps litter and spraying contained in the litter box and makes cleanup a breeze on your end and the included scoop features a hook that can clip onto the inside of the kitty litter pan, keeping it well within reach for whenever you need it. Let's make life a little easier for all.

name: Cat Litter Box - Stainless Steel Litter Box with Lid for Kitty, Metal Base Enclosed Cat Box with Litter Scoop, Elevated Step Box, Activated-Carbon Pack, 17.1" x 13.2" x 15", Grey
short_description: WELL-EQUIPPED CAT BOX: Built with a spacious 17.1" x 13.2" x 15" interior, this stainless steel cat litter box lets cats move freely without feeling cramped. The clip-on scoop stays securely attached to the rim for faster, more efficient cleanup. Supported by non-slip bottom pads, the box stays in place, helping maintain a tidier and more comfortable environment.

ADVANCED LEAK CONTROL: This litterbox features a leak-guard build that controls every mess. Its 15" high walls, interlocking seams, and overlapping edges prevent litter or urine from escaping. The perforated pedal and step box catch loose grains from your cat's paws. This integrated system minimizes scatter and leakage, keeping your home floors clean.

3-MODE OPENING: This stainless steel litter box with lid features a detachable top that shifts between open, semi-enclosed, and fully enclosed modes. This adaptable design suits different personalities and training stages. With tool-free, button-press assembly, owners can switch configurations quickly to keep cats relaxed and comfortable.

CARBON-POWERED ODOR CONTROL: Designed with an enclosed lid and a near-sealed main body, this top entry litter box minimizes odor escape. The activated-carbon pack mounted inside the top lid continuously neutralizes trapped odors, helping your home stay fresher with far less daily effort. Enjoy a cleaner, more pleasant space with this litter box!

SOLID STAINLESS STEEL: This high-sided litter box is built from premium stainless steel, giving it exceptional structural strength that won't warp or dent under pressure. Its rust-resistant composition keeps it looking clean despite water exposure. The smooth, non-porous surface prevents litter from sticking, making every cleanup quick and effortless.
